page.title: 15LOCAL EVENTS IN SHERE
page.content: There are several annual events in which many villagers take part each year. On Palm Sunday we go to Church to sing and a donkey comes. The year before Belinda,the donkey,was getting very fat,she was going to have a baby. We go around the village singing and Belinda leads the way with some one riding her. Every year in Shere we have a Pram Race. It has been going on for 12 years. There is a prize for the best dressed and a prize for the winning team. They go through the ford,over the stile and through another ford and through the woods and back to Shere. There are six in a team, five push and one goes in the pram. The teams are sponsored and the money goes to Charity.
